- **Jul 2025**: Participated in [Google Agentic AI Hackathon](https://vision.hack2skill.com/event/googlecloudagenticaiday2025?utm_source=hack2skill&utm_medium=homepage) 
- **Feb 2024**: Secured first place in [Egnyte Hackathon 2024]() 
- **Jul 2023**: After successfully completing my internship, I joined as a FTE Software Engineer at [Egnyte](https://www.egnyte.com/)
- **May 2023**: Presented paper on [speech to speech translation with lip synchronization]((https://ieeexplore.ieee.org/abstract/document/10142578)) at [ICICCS 2023](https://ieeexplore.ieee.org/xpl/conhome/10142228/proceeding)
- **Jan 2023**: Started my journey as a Software Engineer Intern at [Egnyte](https://www.egnyte.com/)
- **Nov 2022**: 1st Runner-Up in [The Kannada Hackathon](https://events.pes.edu/10646/)
- **Dec 2022**: Published research on [non-sequential video indexing]((https://ieeexplore.ieee.org/abstract/document/10029031)) at [ICACRS 2022](https://ieeexplore.ieee.org/xpl/conhome/10028980/proceeding).
- **Jun 2022**: Joined as a Research Intern at [Indian Institute of Science](https://aero.iisc.ac.in/about/)
- **Oct 2021**: Secured 1st Runner-Up position at the [HashCode 2K21 Hackathon](https://pes-innovation-lab-hashcode.devfolio.co/overview) hosted by [PES Innovation Lab](https://www.theinnovationlab.in/)
- **Jul 2021**: Presented and published research on [modeling learner engagement in MOOCs]((https://papers.ssrn.com/sol3/papers.cfm?abstract_id=3884503)) at [ICICC 2021](https://icicc-conf.com/icicc21).

include-after-body.text:
<script>
  // Wait for everything to be fully loaded, including Quarto navbar tools
  window.addEventListener('load', function() {
    function initThemeToggle() {
      // Try multiple selectors to find the theme toggle button
      const themeToggle = document.querySelector('a[aria-label="Toggle dark mode"]') || 
                        document.querySelector('.quarto-navigation-tool');
      const htmlElement = document.documentElement;
      
      if (!themeToggle) {
        // Try again after a short delay
        setTimeout(initThemeToggle, 100);
        return;
      }
      
      const themeIcon = themeToggle.querySelector('i');
      if (!themeIcon) {
        setTimeout(initThemeToggle, 100);
        return;
      }
      
      // Add ID and fix the double "bi-" prefix in the icon class
      themeToggle.id = 'theme-toggle';
      
      // Check for saved theme preference or default to light mode
      const currentTheme = localStorage.getItem('theme') || 'light';
      
      // Set initial theme
      if (currentTheme === 'dark') {
        htmlElement.setAttribute('data-bs-theme', 'dark');
        themeIcon.className = 'bi bi-sun-fill';
      } else {
        htmlElement.setAttribute('data-bs-theme', 'light');
        themeIcon.className = 'bi bi-moon-fill';
      }
      
      // Theme toggle functionality
      themeToggle.addEventListener('click', function(e) {
        e.preventDefault();
        const currentTheme = htmlElement.getAttribute('data-bs-theme');
        
        if (currentTheme === 'dark') {
          htmlElement.setAttribute('data-bs-theme', 'light');
          themeIcon.className = 'bi bi-moon-fill';
          localStorage.setItem('theme', 'light');
        } else {
          htmlElement.setAttribute('data-bs-theme', 'dark');
          themeIcon.className = 'bi bi-sun-fill';
          localStorage.setItem('theme', 'dark');
        }
      });
    }
    
    initThemeToggle();
  });
</script>
